abstract: Apple dropped the price of music downloads not protected by copy restrictions from $1.29 to 99 cents, coming close to the price charged by Amazon.com and others.
snippet: Apple dropped the price of music downloads not protected by copy restrictions from $1.29 to 99 cents, coming close to the price charged by Amazon.com and others.
lead_paragraph: Apple these days may well have market clout, but it is not bigger than the market.

headline.main: Apple Backs Down on Premium Prices for Unprotected Music
